value:
$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Anger|Urrrgggh...$k$pMortals... Betrayed me!
Discarded me! Even so...$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Lady Embla! It is only a nightmare.
Please. You can rest easy.$k$pWhatever you need, I will make
sure it is so.$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face|Elm... My loyal servant...
Not like those mortals...$k$pOnly you will never betray me...
You are the only one I can trust...
Only you...$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face|Yes, Lady Embla...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Anger|So, you actually came...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Elm...$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Pain|This is it for you, so I am happy
to report that I will be seeing
much less of you in the future.$k$pThat friend of yours... The princely
heir to Lady Embla's blood? She has
already taken him.$k$pI can easily handle you myself.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Your strength will not hold out
for as long as you imply! You have
entered Lord Askr's world!$k$pYou grow continually weaker...
Surely you are aware! Yet you
still intend to fight us?$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Cool|I am...Lady Embla's one true
ally—her only ally!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Stain,Face_Pain|Gah...$k$pYou don't...know when to quit...
do you? How— Urgh! Damn you...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Anger|The loyalty you have displayed
to your master, Embla, is truly
admirable, I cannot deny.$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Stain,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|Elm, retainer to Embla, even
though we are foes, I believe we
can relate to one another...$k$pThe bonds that Lord Askr spoke
of—like the bonds between him and
me... You are bonded with Embla.$k$pAs Askr's retainer, I believe that
I can understand, and even respect,
the way you feel for Embla.$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Stain,Face_Anger|Tch... How dare you...pretend
to know me!$k$p$Sbs150|
